channel.title: Slides on Zhenyu's Page
channel.description: Recent content in Slides on Zhenyu's Page

item.description: Self Introduction - By Zhenyu LiaoSelf IntroductionZhenyu Liao (廖振宇), CentraleSupelec, Paris-Sacaly, France.ResearchMy research interests are broadly in machine learning, random matrix theory and statistics.Tutorial and invited talks■ Tutorial at the 26th European Signal Processing Conference (EUSIPCO’18), Roma, Italy, 2018.■ Invited talks at SJTU, HUAWEI, iCODE, Matrix, SUFE.Paper reviewNeurIPS, ICML, IEEE TSP, NPL. Education■ B.Sc. Optical & Electronic Information, HUST, 2010-2014■ M.Sc. Signal and Image Processing, CentraleSupelec/Paris-Sud, 2014-2016■ Ph.D. Statistics and Computer Science, CentraleSupelec, 2016-2019Visit my personal website for more information.
